Hi, 

I collected a nice test archive of about 100000 docs with 
heritrix 0.6.0
I think it went well (I didn't yet try out very baaad web sites;)
 
Now I try to index the archive with nwatoolset. 
At this point it seems that cdx files are needed.
How do I generate them? 
 
I went to 
http://crawler.archive.org/apidocs/org/archive/io/arc/ARCWriter.html
which shows a procedure 
% av_procarc *.arc.gz | av_ziparc > * .dat.gz 
% av_ripdat *.dat.gz > *.cdx
 
Nearby is a link called 'alexa ARC c-tools' which points to
http://www.archive.org/web/researcher/tool_documentation.php
 
It mentions av_procarc and av_ziparc and gives their usage
but doesn't tell where I could fetch those scripts (perl, shell?)
It doesn't mention av_ripdat.
 
av_remdt looks quite promising too, does this script exist?
 
?kaisa?
